name: Mejula
startIntroPart1: King Ledros of the Mejulian Expanse
startIntroPart2: King Ledros, your army and people desire glory for their civilization. With your military brilliance, will you conquer the world and bring glory to your people?
declaringWar: Your lands are now forfeit, prepare for bloodshed.
attacked: Finally, ive been waiting for a good reason to fight you.
defeated: The Mejulian Expanse is now a failure. A shame really...
introduction: Greetings, you enter lands conquered by I, King Ledros. I look forward to facing you in battle some day.
hateHello: When our armies clash, I hope to see you on the field.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Need time to regroup i see? Come back when you bring enough to challenge Mejula
tradeRequest: I won't offer a second time.
uniqueText: Instead of founding cities you may found war-camps. Unit production within war-camps is greatly increased. Zero border growth in war-camps.
uniques: [1] free [Military] units appear <in [Camp Fortifications] tiles> <every [2] turns> <when at war>
